item.title: Configure AWS Cloud9
item.description: Ad blockers, javascript disabler, and tracking blockers should be disabled for the cloud9 domain, or connecting to the workspace might be impacted. Cloud9 requires third-party-cookies. You can whitelist the specific domains. 1. Configure your AWS Cloud9 development environment In your AWS Cloud9 IDE (find yours by your initials prefix), you can close the welcome tab. Run the following command in the bash tab (at the bottom of the IDE):
